articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets rise as China's factory activity contracts for fourth straight month - CNBC
articles.description: China will see both manufacturing and non-manufacturing activity data from its national bureau of statistics
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets rose on Monday as China's factory activity for July remained in contraction territory for the fourth straight month.

articles.title: Sensex down 161 points to 65,998 in early trade; Nifty at 19,597 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, Asian Paints, Bajaj Finance, Bharti Airtel, ITC, Hindustan Unilever and Kotak Mahindra Bank were the major laggards.
articles.content:
Equity benchmark indices declined in early trade on Monday as investors remained cautious amid continuous foreign fund outflows.
